Methods in ca.proj.game.level that return Tile

          Returns the tile at a specified location on the level.
 

Methods in ca.proj.game.level with parameters of type Tile
 void Level.alterTile(int x, int y, Tile newTile)
          Alters a tile on the level by replacing it with another tile configuration.
 

Uses of Tile in ca.proj.game.level.tiles
 

Subclasses of Tile in ca.proj.game.level.tiles
 class AnimatedTile
          AnimatedTile.java switches between rendering different tiles to achieve an animation effect.
 class BasicSolidTile
          BasicSolidTile.java is a blocked tile that the character cannot walk on.
 class BasicTile
          BasicTile.java is a tile in the game that the player can walk on.
